patieint_description: Jane Doe, a 7-year-old female, presents with craniofacial dysmorphia, limb anomalies, and unexplained growth delays observed since age 2. Craniofacial examination shows epicanthic folds, a broad nasal bridge, and a prominent forehead. Limbs exhibit brachydactyly with mild syndactyly of the 2nd and 3rd fingers bilaterally. Growth parameters are below the 5th percentile for her age.
